content.raw:
None of the 4 worlds are loading for me. `plane_demo`, `plane_propeller_demo` and `quad_rotor_demo` print errors and just hang in the terminal, gzclient doesn't even come up:

~~~
louisep@hadaly:~/gazebo_source/gazeboC/build$ gazebo --verbose ../worlds/plane_demo.world 
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:121] model: lift_drag_demo_model
~~~

~~~
louisep@hadaly:~/gazebo_source/gazeboC/build$ gazebo --verbose ../worlds/quad_rotor_demo.world 
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:121] model: lift_drag_demo_model
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:132] rod_1_joint
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:132] rod_2_joint
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:132] rod_3_joint
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:132] rod_4_joint
Error [Element.cc:684] Missing element description for [control]
~~~

~~~
louisep@hadaly:~/gazebo_source/gazeboC/build$ gazebo --verbose ../worlds/plane_propeller_demo.world 
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:121] model: lift_drag_demo_model
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:132] rod_1_joint
~~~

And the iris world opens gzclient but the screen stays black...

Am I just not waiting long enough? I checked that I have the correct models from the gazebo_models PR.
content.html:
None of the 4 worlds are loading for me. plane_demo, plane_propeller_demo and quad_rotor_demo print errors and just hang in the terminal, gzclient doesn't even come up:

louisep@hadaly:~/gazebo_source/gazeboC/build$ gazebo --verbose ../worlds/plane_demo.world 
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:121] model: lift_drag_demo_model

louisep@hadaly:~/gazebo_source/gazeboC/build$ gazebo --verbose ../worlds/quad_rotor_demo.world 
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:121] model: lift_drag_demo_model
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:132] rod_1_joint
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:132] rod_2_joint
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:132] rod_3_joint
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:132] rod_4_joint
Error [Element.cc:684] Missing element description for [control]

louisep@hadaly:~/gazebo_source/gazeboC/build$ gazebo --verbose ../worlds/plane_propeller_demo.world 
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:121] model: lift_drag_demo_model
[Err] [PlaneDemoPlugin.cc:132] rod_1_joint

And the iris world opens gzclient but the screen stays black...

Am I just not waiting long enough? I checked that I have the correct models from the gazebo_models PR.
